name: Burning The Roots | GGJ3
description:
Young photographer Emmanuel who lives in the woods loves taking polaroid pictures. One day while he was taking photos of a tree close to his house he notices something unusual about the roots of this tree. He captures the phases of this roots growing out. Soon enough he sees some weird creatures that are coming for him from the forest. 

Help Emmanuel to fight these monsters, oh and don't forget to burn the roots of the monsters otherwise creatures won't stop spawning...

Controls:
  • Left Click (Mouse 1) to Fire
  • WASD to Move
  • E to Interact
  • SHIFT to Sneak 
  • ESC to Pause the game
Tips:

- Find the furnace to get an fast start.

- After you kill a creature don’t forget to pick up the dead bodies.

- Search the cabins for more ammos.

- After burning the corpses you can upgrade your weapons.
